dc_description_s: This polygon shapefile represents Historical Land Cover of LOBP eastern sites (Sandy Pond) for 1938. This shapefile contains polygons representing the historical land cover within the watersheds near Sandy Pond, in New York, on the eastern shore of Lake Ontario. These land cover boundaries and types were interpreted from aerial photos dating from 1938. To evaluate broad changes in land cover over time.
dc_publisher_s: New York State Agricultural Experiment Station.
dc_title_s: Historical Land Cover, LOBP eastern sites (Sandy Pond), 1938
dct_spatial_sm: Lake Ontario, New York, United States
Sandy Pond, New York, United States
